channel.title: Alternating between operating systems
channel.description:
Hi all, I have a mac at home and a windows 7 laptop in my studio, both have the axo software installed. I haven't used the windows machine for axo action yet because the internet in my studio is down but today was thinking about it and was wondering if I should expect software issues when switching between them, i.e. connecting my axo core to either of them, using the same SD card. Does anybody know?
thanks!

item.title: Alternating between operating systems
item.dc:creator: @MC_DETH
item.description:
@MC_DETH wrote:

Thank you for your quick response. I am on the latest version, hurrah for versatility!

Read full topic

item.title: Alternating between operating systems
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

no issues - you can freely swap between windows/mac
just make sure you are using the same version of axoloti on both machines (1.0.12)

(iirc, there was a slight issue in previous versions of axoloti where the axoloti firmware would ask to be upgrade each time you moved between OS - not a problem, just a pain - but I'm pretty sure that was fixed in 1.0.12)

Read full topic
